title: Bug 17252accelerator labels: CtrlShiftA, ShiftCtrlA or ShiftCtlA?
description: Bug 17252accelerator labels: CtrlShiftA, ShiftCtrlA or ShiftCtlA? Looking at some gtk (1.x) programs,they actually use ShiftCtl .Either we should be platform compliant (ShiftCtl) or use the unified way(CtrlShift).
OB: F1 on linuxgtk:I see the modifier keys of accelerator labels are reversed on gtk:ShiftCtrl instead of CtrlShift .
